iso_conatus_striving.definition: Isomorphic patterns in conatus striving capture structural equivalences in preservative hierarchies—mappings where persistences, self-preservations, and striving enhancements preserve relations invariantly across scales. These include inherent drivings, adaptive persistences, and emergent unities, validated via 2025 studies (e.g., conatus in AI ethics per web:2/3; mathematical formalism per web:6; naturalism in generative AI per web:0) and cross-scale analogies (e.g., AI self-preservation to biological endurance). Hard-to-vary invariants like striving persistence enable forecasts; upgraded with tetralemma probes for paradox (affirm conatus/deny dissolution/both in adaptations/neither in unities); scores >0.98 based on 2025 Spinozistic abstractions.
handling_rules: Map patterns to persistence-self-preservation-enhancement overlays across scales plus principle; concrete from 2025 studies/web and striving contrasts (e.g., AI ethical conatus to bio endurance).
Validate coverage across scales (subatomic → cosmic); flag gaps as speculative (e.g., cosmic conatus links).
Support sub-categories for compounds (e.g., ethical strivings); integrate diachronic depth (Spinozistic origins to 2025 AI models).
Export lean JSON; no external refs beyond principle.
Apply evaluations; tetralemmas resolve anisomorphisms; contradictions_ledger tracks inconsistencies.

data.description: Core strivings for existence; drivings map invariantly (e.g., conatus in AI naturalism per web:0; ethical product building per web:2).
Strivings through change; persistences preserve adaptation (e.g., conatus in modern eudaimonism per web:8; yoga interpretations per web:7).
Strivings yielding wholes; unities map invariantly (e.g., conatus in solitude per web:5; innate intelligence doctrine per web:1).

gaps: Striving divergences bounded <3% variance per 2025 studies.
tetralemmas: Affirm conatus/deny dissolution/both in adaptations/neither in unities.
